title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's Bears/Commanders matchup. Is Justin Fields the answer in Chicago? ESPN NFL Analyst Marcus Spears calls in and weighs in on questions surrounding Dak Prescott being the starter if Cooper Rush beats the Eagles this weekend. Plus, Dan reacts to Troy Aikman's thoughts on the Cowboys QB situation.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
